title: Best cranberry chutney
ingredients: ['225g (8 oz) cranberries', '2 tomatoes - blanched, peeled and chopped', '50g (2 oz) sultanas', '1/2 small onion, chopped', '1 teaspoon salt', '225g (8 oz) dark brown soft sugar', '100ml (4 fl oz) cider vinegar', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/2 teaspoon ground black pepper', '175ml (6 fl oz) water']
